BaseResult

All DBI Result classes should inherit from BaseResult instead of Result directly.  This class will provide a default implementation of fetchAll() which seems to work on all DBI drivers.

See Also

Result

BaseResult
All DBI Result classes should inherit from BaseResult instead of Result directly.
Functions
fetchRow
fetchAll
Fetch all results returning an array of Row’s
